text: The International Workers Party (IWP) is supposedly a secretive Marxist political organization founded by controversial organizer, playwright and psychotherapist Fred Newman in 1974. Newman would later help found the New Alliance Party. ==See also== *Clouds Blur the Rainbow, 1988, by Chip Berlet *Tvind and The O Two groups with similar politics, which have also been accused of being cults. ==References== *Larry J. Sabato, Howard R. Ernst. "New Alliance Party."
